overall_summary: The forecasting approach focused on handling an identified anomaly (constant values on 2017-08-31) and leveraging daily patterns from non-anomalous days. A robust median-based method was employed to create an hourly profile, repeated across the forecast horizon. The reasoning demonstrated systematic anomaly exclusion, pattern analysis, and adaptation to data limitations while maintaining simplicity.
key_insights: Exclusion of anomalous day (2017-08-31) from training data
Use of median values for robustness against outliers
Assumption of repeating daily patterns due to insufficient weekly data
Explicit handling of datetime alignment for multi-day forecasting
complexity_analysis: Moderately complex with hybrid heuristic-statistical reasoning: combined anomaly detection, hourly pattern analysis, and multi-day projection while acknowledging data limitations that prevented advanced modeling.
